 2017-05322017-05-18,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE BRUCE G. THOMAS, to be a Regional Senior Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario for the Southwest region, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective June 1, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
